text: John William O'Malley (June 11, 1927 – September 11, 2022)In Memoriam: John W. O’Malley, S.J. was an American academic, Catholic historian, and Jesuit priest. He was a University Professor at Georgetown University. He wrote about religious history of Early Modern Europe. ==References== Category:1927 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Academics from Washington, D.C. Category:American historians Category:American Jesuits Category:Writers from Ohio
title: John W. O'Malley
